channel.title: Comments on: Picasa People Tagging / Facial Detection Guide

item.title: By: Lily
item.dc:creator: Lily
item.description: What do you do if it does not recignize a face. How do you tag it?
item.content:encoded: What do you do if it does not recignize a face. How do you tag it?

item.title: By: michael godfrey
item.dc:creator: michael godfrey
item.description:
I think picassa needs some kind of feature that accounts for age. A baby doesn't look like that same person as an old man. I think the person who enters the picture could help (optional) put an age on each picture; picassa could then use age progression algorithms to be part of the face identification/tagging.
I think picassa should have a feature that allows a user to use a circle to identify a location that contains a face. Often picassa does not even know there is a picture of a person in the photo.
item.content:encoded:
I think picassa needs some kind of feature that accounts for age. A baby doesn’t look like that same person as an old man. I think the person who enters the picture could help (optional) put an age on each picture; picassa could then use age progression algorithms to be part of the face identification/tagging.

I think picassa should have a feature that allows a user to use a circle to identify a location that contains a face. Often picassa does not even know there is a picture of a person in the photo.

item.title: By: Lettice
item.dc:creator: Lettice
item.description: I can't hear anything over the sound of how aewosme this article is.
item.content:encoded: I can’t hear anything over the sound of how aewosme this article is.
